text:
**Brutality Unleashed**

A dark alley, a crowd gathers, tension rises.  
A mare lies on the ground, gasping.  
Mikolka: “Finish her off!”  
Crowd: “You butchered her!”  
Mikolka: “My property!”  

---  

A boy rushes to the mare, heartbroken.  
Boy: “Why did they kill her?”  
Father: “Come along, let’s go home.”  
Boy: “Father! I can’t believe this!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Mikolka brutally beats a mare to death while a horrified crowd looks on, prompting a young boy to mourn the animal's suffering.
